casebody.data:
COMMISSIONER OF INTERNAL REVENUE v. Mildred ECKHARD. No. 4001. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. Oct. 14, 1950. Tlieron L. Caudle, Assistant Attorney General, and Ellis N. Slack, Special Assistant to Attorney General, Department of Justice, for petitioner. John E. Marshall and Douglass, Felix & Spradling, all of Oklahoma City, Old., for respondent.

Before PHILLIPS, Chief Judge, and HUN MAN, Circuit Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Reversed pursuant to stipulation on September 7, 1950, on authority of Eckhard v. Commissioner of Internal Revenue, 10 Cir., 182 F.2d 547.
